raw.author: Zac Holt
raw.beforeStartingContent:
- ‣ You will need a [LoyalAs account](https://loyalas.com/signup) in order to connect this integration
- ‣ Think about how much you want to reward referred and referring clients
- ‣ When you first connect to Jobber, LoyalAs will automatically upload your entire customer list
- ‣ Then send a referral link to customers selected from your upload
- ‣ A new LoyalAs referral will automatically generate a new client and work request in your Jobber account
- ‣ All new Jobber clients will automatically be added to LoyalAs and asked for a referral upon paid invoice
raw.description: Referrals are the cheapest, fastest way to land new customers. We automate your referral program so you get quality leads that close at a higher rate, and cost a fraction of digital ads and other lead gen programs.
raw.installationStepsContent:
- ‣ Navigate to settings page in your LoyalAs account
- ‣ Click ΓÇ£ConnectΓÇ¥ next to Jobber
- ‣ Authenticate and approve access to your Jobber account
- ‣ Set credit values for the customer making a referral, and the referred customer
raw.name: LoyalAs

raw.author: Integrately
raw.beforeStartingContent:
- ‣ YouΓÇÖll need an Integrately account to connect this integration
- ‣ [Click here to sign up for Integrately](https://app.integrately.com/signup)
raw.description: Integrately is the easiest automation platform designed especially for non-techies that connects your apps in a single click. Millions of ready-to-use integrations, an intuitive automation builder, a guided user interface, and top-rated live-chat support make it stand out in the automation world.
raw.installationStepsContent:
- ‣ Step 1: Login or Sign up for Integrately
- ‣ Step 2: Search and select Jobber and the other app that you wish to connect
- ‣ Step 3: After selecting an app, You can either choose from the ready-to-activate automations Or, create your own custom automation
- ‣ Step 4: You can ask Integrately AI to create an automation for you or select either the 1-click integration or create custom automation by selecting the trigger and action
- ‣ Step 5: Next, you need to connect your Jobber account
- ‣ Step 6: Similarly connect the other app account. Once connected, map the fields for automation, and that's it. Click the Test and Turn On button. Your automation is all set and ready!
raw.name: Integrately
